name: Hangman's Folly - Level 1
description:
_,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-.

Being the adult child of a powerful monster-hunter doesn't mean you life is going to be interesting. If you want more than this you have to go out there and grab the dragon by the horns.

Read deranged social media posts, check local news reports, and consult a bestiary, to identify & confront the creatures attacking your village. 

,.-`*'-., _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-.

Contains:

  • Over four thousand words of Story
    • Over one thousand word Bestiary
  • Four whole ASCII Images!

,.-`*'-., _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-. _,.-`*'-.

Thanks to NaNoWriMo and ViNoWriMo for motivation. ASCII mostly using text-image.com
